page.title: 03CARDREW IND.EST.,REDRUTH
page.content: The Cardrew Industrial Estate is a Kerrier Council industrial development opened in 1982.Redruth is a 'Special Development Area' which means that grants are available towards the capital costs of new industrial buildings, plant and machinery The site is linked to the main A30 trunk road and Redruth main line station, 1 mile away.There are 23 businesses operating from the estate, ranging in size from ROWE & CO. HOLDING with 140 employees in 62,539 sq.ft. building complex to the 493 sq.ft. WORKSHOP UNIT which houses the Concrete Testing Station and its 1 employee.We gathered information from 19 of the 23 businesses(83% sample) by interviewing the Personnel manager of each business at his place of work.
